name: key_metrics
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool holistic_finance_stock_data.
Tool description: Provides stock data based on multiple sources such as Yahoo Finance.
API description: Provides either annual or quarterly key metrics of a single stock company.

symbol.description: The ticker symbol of the stock company.

period.description: The period for which to fetch metrics, either 'annual' or 'quarterly'.
